message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $85 is a fair offer, I'm aiming for something closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $87.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit lower on the budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $82.50?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I need to be closer to $90 to make this work.  How about we split the difference at $86?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to be as budget-friendly as possible. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $81?
